long_description: The REI Bikini briefs work great when travelling, hiking, running, skiing or just hanging out. Soft fabric blend of nylon and spandex breathes well, moves moisture away from you and dries quickly. Feminine fit offers 4-way stretch. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Excellent dry time makes the REI Bikini Briefs great for travel. Brushed waistband with high elasticity ensures a comfortable fit outing after outing. Seams are located forward of hips to enhance comfort.
short_description: The REI Bikini briefs work great when travelling, hiking, running, skiing or just hanging out.
